attributes.action: Allow the purchase of hexamine tablets for hobbyists
attributes.background: Allow the use of solid fuel hexamine tablets to be purchased by the public without the need for an EPP license when being sold in tablet form to heat  model steam engines

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Ease restrictions on sale, purchase and possession of Waxed Hexamine Tablets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657782
